alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 12 at 1:27PM EDT until June 12 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Tornado Warning for... North central York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 127 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Manchester, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Valley Green around 140 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Goldsboro, York Haven and Newberrytown. This includes Interstate 83 from mile markers 25 to 34. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
